ProductList.name: Nasi Lemak
ProductList.description: Fragrant rice cooked in coconut milk, served with anchovies, peanuts, boiled eggs, cucumber, and sambal.

ProductList.name: Satay
ProductList.description: Grilled skewers of marinated meat (usually chicken or beef) served with peanut sauce.

ProductList.name: Laksa
ProductList.description: Spicy noodle soup with a coconut milk base, typically containing prawns, chicken, or fish.

ProductList.name: Roti Canai
ProductList.description: Indian-influenced flatbread served with curry sauce for dipping.

ProductList.name: Rendang
ProductList.description: Slow-cooked and flavorful meat (often beef) in coconut milk and spices.

ProductList.name: Mee Goreng
ProductList.description: Stir-fried noodles with a variety of ingredients, including vegetables, eggs, and prawns.
